LanguageData.Brewing.label: basic brewing
LanguageData.Brewing.description: Build a brewery in order to begin brewing tasty beer, kumis, and wine!
LanguageData.RC2_IntermediateBrewing.label: intermediate brewing
LanguageData.RC2_IntermediateBrewing.description: Expand your alcoholic nature by being able to brew a whole bunch of new stuff!
LanguageData.RC2_AdvancedBrewing.label: advanced brewing
LanguageData.RC2_AdvancedBrewing.description: Learn how to build a distillery to brew the strongest of alcohols and spirits!
